data.text: @sarahbeth345 @Frosty_A @Jusrangers OC is the OG.  In Spring 2020 they were one of the first counties to fight against local mask mandates.
@Frosty_A @Jusrangers Does that include the actual Orange County, by any chance?  Sorry, I couldn't resist the pun, lol.
@sarahbeth345 @Jusrangers 🤣 oh but masks and the vax is our way out of this, right!?!
@Marie46164487 @Jusrangers Someone whose job it is to handle the depression and broken families?
@Jusrangers Except in NY state… ugh. I’m worried Hochul will use these counties as the excuse to keep the whole state masked, including “low” risk NYC, while NYC will happily go along with this…

@mollibb @Sa1tySteve Gee Molly what’s it like up there on your high horse? You do realize a persons vaccine status doesn’t make them superior or in superior? The vax mandates are collapsing everywhere. I’m sure you’re one of the ones in two years time who will say you always supported peoples choice.

@MarioProfiterol @Jusrangers I hope so, but I am truly not copacetic with it being so easy to turn on and off. That's the worst part about the tier system: the constant sense of uncertainty if it will change back.
